48 HOURS CHALLENGE, IFVA Carnival, 2020, Hand drawn, 5 sec, Hong Kong
Animation artist: Äggie Lee Pak Yee
Organized by the Hong Kong Arts Centre, the animation challenge gathered 50 active Hong Kong animators to co-create an animation music video Keep on Running in the framework of “secret room”. Full length MV can be found here.

CHILDREN ANIMATION 12 WEEKS WORKSHOP, 2016
Workshops included: basic understanding of animation principal, drawing, cut-out, clay, sand animation practice, puppet-making and mask-making. (Click here to see children’s work!)
